WorkItem.Description:
If you specify one or more default gemming sets for your gear AND check the remove non matching ones, you will still find non-matching gemmed items in the item lists.
I would expect that ONLY items that matched your gemming sets would be left in the item lists -- instead I find a variety of questionable older gemmings (including using gemmings not in game yet)
WorkItem.Summary: Default Gemming - Removal of old ones

Comments.Message:
Equipped and available items will not be deleted either.

Additionally, I have heard of occasionally some other items being left undeleted, but haven't seen that myself or been able to determine why. Since we're redoing that whole gemming system soon, I'm not too concerned, though.

To properly clear out gemmings you don't want, make sure to have no characters loaded, because items that are available to the optimizer (green diamond is selected) or equipped will gain new gemmings, but not have any obsolete gem sets deleted.
